issue.title: [C++] Upgrade string-view-light to latest
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5167](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5167). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
string-view-lite had a typo in one of its macros (fixed in https://github.com/martinmoene/string-view-lite/commit/2f2cce35293b0027056e5449b2c05b5f9c3e89ff).  We should vendor the latest version in the next Arrow release.
